<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"RCO monthly report"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/pix/rco-report"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint to request a RCO monthly report

The RCO file will be made available at the 5th business day

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixLocationIndirect","description":"Request to create payload RCO.","required":["clientRequestId","merchant","locationType"],"type":"object","allOf":[{"required":["clientRequestId","reportDate","fileType"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"The unique transaction identification given by the client side. This value can't be repeated.","type":"string","properties":{"merchantCategoryCode":{"format":"int32","type":"integer"},"merchantCity":{"type":"string"},"merchantName":{"type":"string"},"postalCode":{"type":"string"}},"example":"\"5aeb09c7-ff6d-41e5-bd80-ca4fca6e4e33\""},"tags":{"description":"A list with tags.","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}},"reportDate":{"description":"The year and month in format yyyy-MM","type":"string","example":"\"2021-11\""},"fileType":{"description":"The file type of RCO report\n\nTRD: RCO Demonstrative File, containing Pix transactions with the purpose of withdrawal or change settled in the SPI, grouped by type of withdrawal agent and participants involved.\n\nTRT: Total RCO file with the net debit or credit position of reimbursement of operating costs of the direct participant of the SPI in relation to each of the other direct participants of the SPI.","enum":["TRD","TRT"],"type":"string","example":"TRT"}}}],"example":{"clientRequestId":"80633bf3-2837-407f-a882-888d6b140ecb","tags":["exemplo de request","Mais um exemplo de texto"],"reportDate":"2021-09","fileType":"TRD"}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
